code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  minimumTime ( vector < int >&  jobs ,  vector < int >&  workers )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   ranges :: sort ( jobs );   ranges :: sort ( workers );   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  jobs . size ();  ++ i )   ans  =  max ( ans ,  ( jobs [ i ]  -  1 )  /  workers [ i ]  +  1 );   return  ans ;   }  };
